Public MustInherit Class Operation(Of T) Inherits Operation

Docs.typeparam: The final result of the long-running operation.
Docs.summary: Represents a long-running operation that returns a value when it completes.

Protected Sub New ()
public abstract bool HasValue { get; }
.property instance bool HasValue
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property HasValue As Boolean
member this.HasValue : bool

Docs.summary: Returns true if the long-running operation completed successfully and has produced final result (accessible by Value property).

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract T Value { get; }
.property instance !T Value
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Value As T
member this.Value : 'T

Docs.summary: Final result of the long-running operation.
Docs.remarks: This property can be accessed only after the operation completes successfully (HasValue is true).

Docs.param: A used for the periodical service calls.
Docs.summary: Periodically calls the server till the long-running operation completes.
Docs.returns: The last HTTP response received from the server.
Docs.remarks: This method will periodically call UpdateStatusAsync till HasCompleted is true, then return the final result of the operation.
